newsitem.title: AUSTRALIA: Australia returns 46 boatpeople to China.
newsitem.headline: Australia returns 46 boatpeople to China.

text.p: The Australian government said on Sunday it had returned 46 boatpeople to China at the weekend.
"These people failed to engage Australia's protection obligations and were sent back home to China," Immigration Minister Philip Ruddock said in a statement.
The group comprised 25 men, 11 women and eight children who arrived in Australia on April 30, 1997, as well as one man and one woman who arrived here on June 15, 1996.
Ruddock said their return brought the number of unauthorised boat arrivals removed from Australia in 1996/97 ending June 30 to 291.
